definition: place at the imperial court, where emperor handled government affairs, gave orders etc

sentences.english: The structure of palace house has differences between the outer palace and the inner court.
sentences.chinese: 宮中殿宇佈設格局有外朝與內廷之分。

sentences.english: Because a secret place, not generally open to visit.
sentences.chinese: 因爲屬於內廷地方，一般不開放參觀。

sentences.english: Serve for inside oblation in the tribunal becomes intimate with bad make of, is still us of human.
sentences.chinese: 擔任內廷供奉親近差使的，還是咱們的人。

sentences.english: Inner Court is the most famous Hall of Mental Cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 內廷中最著名的是養心殿。

definition: official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
accurate depiction of architectural forms with the aid of a ruler (technique of Chinese art)/picture created using this technique
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
kesi or k’o-ssu, Chinese silk tapestry woven in a pictorial design
Longevity Hill in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
Giuseppe Castiglione (1688-1766) Jesuit who served as Qing court painter for 50 years
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
may you enjoy boundless longevity (idiom)/long may you live
honorific title/form of address reserved for a queen, ancestor, emperor etc
